configure_os.name: configure_os
configure_os.description: Specify if OS on PowerVS instances should be configured for SAP or if only PowerVS instances should be created.

dns_host_or_ip.name: dns_host_or_ip
dns_host_or_ip.description: DNS forwarder/server hosname or IP address. E.g., 10.10.10.6

nfs_client_directory.name: nfs_client_directory
nfs_client_directory.description: NFS directory on PowerVS instances. Will be used only if nfs_server is setup in 'Power infrastructure for regulated industries'

nfs_path.name: nfs_path
nfs_path.description: Full path on NFS server (in form <hostname_or_ip>:<directory>, e.g., '10.20.10.4:/nfs').

ntp_host_or_ip.name: ntp_host_or_ip
ntp_host_or_ip.description: NTP forwarder/server hosname or IP address. E.g., 10.10.10.7

os_image_distro.name: os_image_distro
os_image_distro.description: Image distribution to use for all instances(Shared, HANA, Netweaver). Supported values are 'SLES' or 'RHEL'. OS release versions may be specified in optional parameters.

powervs_additional_networks.name: powervs_additional_networks
powervs_additional_networks.description: Existing list of subnets name to be attached to an instance. First network has to be a management network.

powervs_cloud_connection_count.name: powervs_cloud_connection_count
powervs_cloud_connection_count.description: Existing number of Cloud connections to which new subnet must be attached.

powervs_hana_additional_storage_config.name: powervs_hana_additional_storage_config
powervs_hana_additional_storage_config.type:
object({
    names      = string
    disks_size = string
    counts     = string
    tiers      = string
    paths      = string
  })
powervs_hana_additional_storage_config.description: Additional File systems to be created and attached to PowerVS instance for SAP HANA. 'disk_sizes' are in GB. 'count' specify over how many storage volumes the file system will be striped. 'tiers' specifies the storage tier in PowerVS workspace. For creating multiple file systems, specify multiple entries in each parameter in the structure. E.g., for creating 2 file systems, specify 2 names, 2 disk sizes, 2 counts, 2 tiers and 2 paths.

powervs_hana_custom_storage_config.name: powervs_hana_custom_storage_config
powervs_hana_custom_storage_config.type:
object({
    names      = string
    disks_size = string
    counts     = string
    tiers      = string
    paths      = string
  })
powervs_hana_custom_storage_config.description: Custom File systems to be created and attached to PowerVS instance for SAP HANA. 'disk_sizes' are in GB. 'count' specify over how many storage volumes the file system will be striped. 'tiers' specifies the storage tier in PowerVS workspace. For creating multiple file systems, specify multiple entries in each parameter in the structure. E.g., for creating 2 file systems, specify 2 names, 2 disk sizes, 2 counts, 2 tiers and 2 paths.

powervs_hana_instance_name.name: powervs_hana_instance_name
powervs_hana_instance_name.description: Name of instance which will be created.

powervs_hana_sap_profile_id.name: powervs_hana_sap_profile_id
powervs_hana_sap_profile_id.description: SAP HANA profile to use. Must be one of the supported profiles. See [here](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/sap?topic=sap-hana-iaas-offerings-profiles-power-vs). File system sizes are automatically calculated. Override automatic calculation by setting values in optional powervs_hana_custom_storage_config parameter.

powervs_netweaver_instance_name.name: powervs_netweaver_instance_name
powervs_netweaver_instance_name.description: Name of netweaver instance which will be created

powervs_netweaver_server_type.name: powervs_netweaver_server_type
powervs_netweaver_server_type.description: Processor type e980, s922, s1022 or e1080

powervs_netweaver_storage_config.name: powervs_netweaver_storage_config
powervs_netweaver_storage_config.type:
object({
    names      = string
    disks_size = string
    counts     = string
    tiers      = string
    paths      = string
  })
powervs_netweaver_storage_config.description: File systems to be created and attached to PowerVS instance for SAP NetWeaver. 'disk_sizes' are in GB. 'count' specify over how many storage volumes the file system will be striped. 'tiers' specifies the storage tier in PowerVS workspace. For creating multiple file systems, specify multiple entries in each parameter in the structure. E.g., for creating 2 file systems, specify 2 names, 2 disk sizes, 2 counts, 2 tiers and 2 paths.

powervs_resource_group_name.name: powervs_resource_group_name
powervs_resource_group_name.description: Existing IBM Cloud resource group name.

powervs_sap_network.name: powervs_sap_network
powervs_sap_network.description: Name and CIDR for new network for SAP system to create.

powervs_share_instance_name.name: powervs_share_instance_name
powervs_share_instance_name.description: Name of instance which will be created

powervs_share_server_type.name: powervs_share_server_type
powervs_share_server_type.description: Processor type e980, s922, s1022 or e1080

powervs_share_storage_config.name: powervs_share_storage_config
powervs_share_storage_config.type:
object({
    names      = string
    disks_size = string
    counts     = string
    tiers      = string
    paths      = string
  })
powervs_share_storage_config.description: File systems to be created and attached to PowerVS instance for shared storage file systems. 'disk_sizes' are in GB. 'count' specify over how many storage volumes the file system will be striped. 'tiers' specifies the storage tier in PowerVS workspace. For creating multiple file systems, specify multiple entries in each parameter in the structure. E.g., for creating 2 file systems, specify 2 names, 2 disk sizes, 2 counts, 2 tiers and 2 paths.

powervs_workspace_name.name: powervs_workspace_name
powervs_workspace_name.description: Existing Name of the PowerVS workspace.

proxy_host_or_ip_port.name: proxy_host_or_ip_port
proxy_host_or_ip_port.description: Proxy hosname or IP address with port. E.g., 10.10.10.4:3128 <ip:port>

ssh_private_key.name: ssh_private_key
ssh_private_key.description: Private SSH key used to login to IBM PowerVS instances. Should match to uploaded public SSH key referenced by 'powervs_sshkey_name'.

access_host_or_ip.name: access_host_or_ip
access_host_or_ip.description: Public IP to manage the environment

hana_instance_private_ips.name: hana_instance_private_ips
hana_instance_private_ips.description: Private IPs of the HANA instance.

netweaver_instance_private_ips.name: netweaver_instance_private_ips
netweaver_instance_private_ips.description: Private IPs of all NetWeaver instances.

share_fs_instance_private_ips.name: share_fs_instance_private_ips
share_fs_instance_private_ips.description: Private IPs of the Share FS instance.
